Hi there, I'm
Noah Yamamoto

I'm a CIS student at Baruch College. I love making things on the web and have worked for cool companies like Marvel, Refugees United, and Squarespace (2019)

Projects

Choochoo

A progressive web application that gives you real-time updates of weather and train status at any MTA station in NYC.

Check it out

Sudoku

My first progressive web app, a simple but featureful Sudoku game that uses a custom algorithm to generate infinite puzzles of varying difficulty.

Check it out

This very website! I coded this site from scratch using lots of modern features and techniques like HTML5 Canvas and templating engines.
